name: Lights Out (itch) (Oddur)
description:
A remake of Lights Out, now with more colors available.

This was a quick solo project for the GMI community jam 2022 which had the theme "Lights".

Instructions:

  • The objective is to turn off all the lights by clicking on them
  • Each tile you click also affects its adjacent tiles
  • The number of colors is the max number of times a tile must be clicked for it to turn off
  • The order of clicks does not matter, you get the same result either way

I also added a random level generator that works for each setting. It starts with a blank board and makes  between 5 and 25 random moves on it to create a solvable puzzle. The game does not save the random levels, so they can not be reset.

Level 0 in each setting is intended as a sandbox to figure out the mechanics. As soon as you make it blank again after messing with it you progress to level 1. Or you can just press the Next button.

Happy holidays :)
